name: TO VALHALLAH
description:
THE STORY OF SVEN

One must lose his life in epic battle in order to be let into Valhallah.

Everybody knows that.

It's the year 500 and Sven the viking just cut himself in the most embarrassing way possible. He can no longer call himself a man, and now has about 10 minutes to find an epic battle to die in.

No norse mythology god with respect for themself will let Sven into Valhallah in this condition.

Run for north mythology god's sake.

CONTROLS

This section is very important, please study this.

  • ARROW KEYS to MOVE
  • UP to JUMP
  • LEFT SHIFT to DASH (every like 3 seconds)
  • DOUBLE JUMP to DOUBLE JUMP
  • WALL JUMPS are A THING
